strings.strings.public_connect_fail_hint_1: 1.Check that the device has sufficient power and is powered on
strings.strings.public_connect_fail_hint_2: 2.Place the device close to the phone to be connected (within 10 meters).

strings.useHiLink: If you need to use the HiLink protocol to control your device, ensure that your connected device has been connected to the Huawei HiLink platform. For details, see:
